title: Al Darreh
text: Al Darreh (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Āl Darreh) is a village in <a href="Sajjadrud%20Rural%20District">Sajjadrud Rural District</a>, <a href="Bandpey-ye%20Sharqi%20District">Bandpey-ye Sharqi District</a>, <a href="Babol%20County">Babol County</a>, <a href="Mazandaran%20Province">Mazandaran Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 179, in 53 families.
